meta_title: Next Level: A Unified Ecosystem for Your Growth
meta_description: It's not just an LMS. It is an integrated ecosystem for learning, collaboration and analytics that gives companies full control over employee development.
og_title: Next Level: A Unified Ecosystem for Your Growth
og_description: It's not just an LMS. It is an integrated ecosystem for learning, collaboration and analytics that gives companies full control over employee development.
hero_title2: A Unified Ecosystem for Your Growth
hero_subtitle: "Next Level" is an innovative Learning Management System (LMS) that gives companies full control over corporate training and employee development in a single, secure online ecosystem.
ecosystem_subtitle: The Next Level platform is more than just an LMS. It is a complete ecosystem where each element works to achieve a single goal - effective and continuous development.
ecosystem_lms_core_desc: The central component for managing courses, users and content. Create, assign and track learning materials.
ecosystem_marketplace_desc: An internal portal where employees can find and request access to new courses, and the company can monetize expertise.
ecosystem_collaboration_desc: Knowledge sharing tools: forums, knowledge bases and chats to discuss tasks and projects in the context of learning.
ecosystem_analytics_desc: Interactive dashboards for tracking KPIs, analyzing the effectiveness of training and forecasting the development needs of teams.
features_subtitle: We offer powerful tools to create a comprehensive educational environment that adapts to your needs.
features_cross_platform_desc: A single application for Web, Mobile and Desktop, which guarantees the same experience for all users.
features_gamification_desc: Increase motivation with achievements, points and ratings, turning learning into an exciting process.
features_branding_desc: Adapt the appearance of the platform to the corporate style of your company.
features_integration_desc: Connect the LMS to your internal systems (HRM, CRM) to automate processes.
features_course_builder_desc: Create interactive courses with texts, videos, tests and simulations without programming skills.
features_security_desc: Data protection with Client-Side Encryption, which guarantees complete confidentiality of information.
ai_assistant_subtitle: Use the power of artificial intelligence to personalize and automate learning.
ai_assistant_personal_path_desc: AI analyzes your goals and suggests the optimal learning path.
ai_assistant_content_gen_desc: Automatic creation of tests, quizzes and short lesson descriptions.
ai_assistant_mentor_desc: Get answers to questions and hints 24/7.
arch_subtitle: Our platform is built on robust technologies that ensure high performance, scalability, and cross-platform compatibility for any business.
arch_client_tech_desc: A single Dart codebase compiles into native applications for iOS, Android, Web (WASM), Windows, macOS, and Linux, ensuring maximum performance and a unified UX.
arch_backend_tech_desc: Using Firebase as a Backend-as-a-Service abstracts the server infrastructure, guaranteeing scalability, security, and real-time data synchronization.
arch_detail_placeholder_desc: Learn about the technologies used to ensure performance and security.
security_title: Data Security and Encryption in the LMS
security_subtitle: "Next Level" LMS uses Client-Side Encryption (CSE) for maximum content protection. The access key is generated on-device and never transmitted to the server.
security_step1_desc: User attempts to access an encrypted course.
security_step2_desc: The School Password is converted into a key (KDF).
audience_subtitle: We have created a flexible environment that unites all participants in the educational process.
audience_business_desc: Create corporate universities, train employees, analyze progress and manage knowledge in a single secure system.
audience_teachers_desc: Monetize your expertise. Create and sell courses, build a personal brand and interact with your audience.
audience_students_desc: Find courses for every taste in the open marketplace. Develop and reach new career heights.
